item.title: American Alligator Pack
item.description: American alligators are usually found in freshwater swamps, marshes, rivers, lakes, and occasionally smaller bodies of water.

item.title: Amur Leopard Mini Pack
item.description: The Amur leopard is one of nine recognised subspecies of leopard.
